trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Minervino di Lecce
There were no other sightings in Minervino di Lecce on or around August 6th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi have been watching the website *link moved to additional evidence section below--sgonzalez\cms. and read one and wrote one report re ufos there. i have deduced that the shapes in the air may be reflections--they seem to multiply when there are more cars parked in the area. it is well lit, to say the least. i think cars are parked below the camera, and they reflect light up into the lens. this also accounts for movement of the shapes. the glowing disklike crafts that pass right to left in the dark are still a mystery, however. watch 4:30 a m to 4:50 or so.
